title: Technical-Impact.Infer.Output
description: Profile-aware output for the Technical-Impact.Infer capability.

technical_impact.description: Inferred technical impact for the provided assets.

risk_level.description: Overall technical risk level inferred from the assets.

dependencies.description: List of technical dependencies identified during inference.

compliance_notes.description: Optional notes regarding compliance considerations or constraints.

profile.description: Optional updated profile after applying profilePatch.

profilePatch.description: Optional patch representing modifications applied during execution.

governanceLabels.description: Optional governance labels for downstream classification.
